channel.title: Porting BMS textures to another mod?
channel.description:
Hi everyone.
Just a simple question: is it legal to port Black Mesa textures (and models' textures) to a Goldsource engine mod?
Thank you in advance. ^^

item.title: Porting BMS textures to another mod?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Yes, really.
Assets in the mod (2012) version are released under a CC license, so you can provided you credit the team. Still iffy on the Steam version.

Read full topic
item.source: Porting BMS textures to another mod?
